Open Camera

Brief:

"Open Camera" is a versatile and feature-packed camera application designed to enhance the photography experience on Android devices. Leveraging the full potential of your device's camera hardware, it offers a wealth of settings and modes to create stunning visual content. Its ability to deliver a professional level of control places it among the most comprehensive camera apps available on the open-source market.
